title: GPT Math
description: Basic experiment of improving math problem solving for ChatGPT

title: DSRLM GPT
description: Basic experiment of improving logical reasoning (specifically relation extractions) for ChatGPT

title: Program Synthesizer
description: Basic program-by-example (PBE) synthesizer that can generate programs that perform basic array manipulation and arithmetic on an input array. Does bottom-up and top-down enumeration to search for programs

title: MeetCode
description: A collaborative platform to learn LeetCode problems together. Submitted to the Boilermake X hackathon

title: VChess
description: Basic C++ chess engine for playing chess games and generating optimal moves. Designed to be paired with a GUI and be a backend for chess programs. Deployable to the web with WebAssembly

title: Sorting Visualizer
description: Web app that animates many different sorting algorithms

title: yt-dlp GUI
description: Simple GUI for the popular Youtube downloader library

title: Vusic
description: Fast and easy to use music player and queuer, inspired by Discord GroovyBot. Submitted to the BoilerMake VIII Hackathon

title: BF Interpreter
description: Simple Brainf**k interpreter writen in C. Has basic error checking.

title: Blanner
description: A degree and semester course planner for Purdue students. Submitted to the Boilermake IX Hackathon

title: vsearch
description: An attempt to make a customizable web crawler/data miner wth search engine features

title: vBlocker
description: Simple browser extension that blocks user specified domains with a password

title: HealthEye
description: A video analytics IoT system that allows you to monitor people traffic and COVID social distancing violations. Uses Microsoft Azure Web services. Submitted to the Microsoft Azure AI 2021 Hackathon

title: ASCII Art Converter
description: Converts regular images to text characters based on pixel intensity, adding some "text-ure" to them!

title: Portfolio Website
description: Website to showcase my projects and personal links
